title: Understanding Series Creation
text: To generate a series, start by manually entering a few numbers that represent the pattern you want to establish.

title: Recognize the Pattern
text: Observe the difference or increment between the numbers you have manually entered. In this series, the increment is $$3$$.

title: Using Fill Handle
text: In a spreadsheet like Google Sheets, there's a tool to propagate the sequence automatically. It's called the 'Fill Handle.'

title: Position is Key
text: Click and drag the 'Fill Handle' (a small square at the bottom-right of the selected cells containing your initial number entries) to fill down the column.
